            VersionOperator.Equal          => "",
            VersionOperator.GreaterThan    => ">",
            VersionOperator.GreaterOrEqual => ">=",
            VersionOperator.LessOrEqual    => "<=",
            VersionOperator.LessThan       => "<",
            _                              => $"[Invalid operator: {Operator}]"
        } - Version
